title: Will there be a wave 3 of Mech vs Minions?
body: Will there be a wave 3 of Mech vs Minions? Please? Pretty Please? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: I don't actually have any new info on the next wave of MvM quite yet, but be sure to check that merch page here and there to see when it's restocked!
